name: Lassie Princess Runner - Continual Sprinter Game
name_original: Lassie Princess Runner - Continual Sprinter Game
description:
Help beautiful princess to collect diamonds,save her from obstacles and police who is chasing her in this endless running game.Surprises along the way there would special powers for you like shield , boost your score multiplier and magnets and many more.

Are you ready to join the great everlasting and limitless running game! Step into your woodland scenario and begin this witty running game. Accelerate yourself through these hairtrigger steps while tilting and swiping to avoid the obstacles and elusion princess from craving police inspector who is looking for her.

Your job is to collect precious diamonds but remember this is not the cinch as you think. There will
be a lots gravel in the dragway which can be endangerment for your lifeblood.You need to avoid those hurdles by saltation or sliding left/right/down.

While playing the game you will find lots of bottleneck in weald foggy atmosphere like heap of gravel but you need to run posthaste to get your triumph and also elusion your self from constabulary police inspector.

Find new and exciting paths to explore across the way, and go through those special levels to earn more scores ! Featuring many exciting environments in the forest, avoid the obstacle, make your sweetest dreams come true in sweet woodland.

Sovereign Princess is back with a Limitless run with aswsome moves, special items and beautiful graphics. Take control of our hapless Princess as he runner her quest to remain among the living !

Main Features:

- Lots of obstacles
- Dozens of Diamonds to collect
- Limitless running game
- Foggy atmosphere
- Lots of power in way !

How long can you run in the forest ? Find out, by downloading Princess Runner
